modName: Robed Steel Plate Armor for Warriors
descriptionHtml:
Requires Robed Steel Plate Armor by madcat221

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10506

Alternate esp for use with the above referenced armor. No Magic requirement. No enchant. Craft it under steel. 6 color variations.

Made from scratch. Use this esp alone or alongside madcat221's esp if you want both. Original esp not required, just make sure you download and install the original meshes and textures.

None of the extras you see in the pics. This is just Madcat's armor. Visit his page to see illustrations of the armor. Only difference here is 3 more color variations on the robe, no enchant and the ability to craft it :)

===Install========

NMM:

Do madcat221's mod

do mine

play

Manual Install:

Do madcat221's mod

do mine

check one or both of the esp's

play
author: jdegenerate
